response.job_title: Hydrology and Hydraulics | Hydrometry  | Irrigation | Water Resources Modeling
response.summary: Engineer with a master’s degree in water sciences. Experience in water management and hydrological modelling. Deep interest in fieldwork, hydrometry and monitoring. Skills in project management, programming, research and development.
response.skills: Hydrology, Modeling, Statistical Data Analysis, Programming, IT Development, Research and Development (R&D), Water Resource Management, Project Management, Irrigation, R, C++, R Markdown

profile_positions.description:
- Conducted technical analyses of data and hydrological models for an operational low-flow forecasting platform and prepared reports
- Contributed to the IT development of the platform, incorporating additional features and functionalities
profile_positions.title: Hydrological engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Conducted projects focused on the modernization of the Institute’s hydrometeorological monitoring networks
- Performed comprehensive review and updates of technical specifications and plans for the installation of proposed hydrometeorological stations
profile_positions.title: Hydrological engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Conducted hydrometeorological data analysis for regional water studies
- Performed daily rainfall‑runoff modelling at the watershed scale and contributed to improving water resource management
profile_positions.title: Hydrological engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Developed and improved a hydrological model of pesticide transfer using an IT modelling platform
- Conducted data analysis and validation, encompassing hydrological measurements and numerical simulations of flow patterns
profile_positions.title: Technical project manager in water resources

profile_positions.description:
- Conducted spatio‑temporal modelling of water flows in border irrigation
- Integrated hydraulic, hydrological and agronomic models to assess various water management scenarios
profile_positions.title: Hydraulic Modeller

profile_positions.description:
- Installed instruments, conducted measurements, and monitored soil moisture and water retention in diverse pedoclimatic contexts
- Prepared weekly bulletins on water management
profile_positions.title: Irrigation and water management

profile_positions.description: - Reviewed documents and studies for the design of small-scale irrigated perimeters
profile_positions.title: Irrigation Engineer

company.name: INRAE
company.description:
INRAE, l’Institut national de recherche pour l’agriculture, l’alimentation et l’environnement, est un acteur majeur de la recherche et de l’innovation créé le 1er janvier 2020. Institut de recherche finalisé issu de la fusion entre l’Inra et Irstea, INRAE rassemble une communauté de 12 000 personnes, avec un peu plus de 200 unités de recherche et une quarantaine d’unités expérimentales implantées dans 18 centres sur toute la France. L’institut se positionne parmi les tout premiers leaders mondiaux en sciences agricoles et alimentaires, en sciences du végétal et de l’animal, et se classe 11ème mondial en écologie-environnement. INRAE a pour ambition d’être un acteur clé des transitions nécessaires pour répondre aux grands enjeux mondiaux. Face à l’augmentation de la population, au changement climatique, à la raréfaction des ressources et au déclin de la biodiversité, l’institut construit des solutions pour des agricultures multi-performantes, une alimentation de qualité et une gestion durable des ressources et des écosystèmes.
http://jobs.inrae.fr
